description: Application for approval of reserved matters pursuant to Condition 45 (zone details) of planning permission DC/08/00887/FUL and for the neighbourhood centre within Stage 1. The proposed development comprises a local community campus which includes adult services and health provision, a cafe and foyer, a place of worship, offices, primary school with sport, recreational and play areas, nursery, a landscaped public square, CHP building, retail units (Use Class A1-A3), of up to 820 sq.m, a home delivery store, a Metropolitan Police Safer Neighbourhoods team base, 93 residential units and associated landscaping, car parking and ancillary engineering and other operations.
